entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:55 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 6:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 15 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
